rules.description: üÖ∞Ô∏èüìñ Inoreader: v opens in background, switch jk & np
üÖ∞Ô∏èüî® Hammerspoon: ‚åòQ ‚Üí Close instead of Quit, ‚åòK ‚Üí Clear Console, ‚åò‚áßC ‚Üí copy last command

conditions.description: Prevent footpedal from accidentally triggering twice.

rules.description: üêÅ R (tap): Open link in background (when in Browser)

to_if_alone.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events"
  tell process "Brave Browser"
    set frontmost to true
    click menu item "Back" of menu "History" of menu bar 1
  end tell
end tell'

osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events"
  tell process "Finder"
    set frontmost to true
    click menu item "Back" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1
  end tell
end tell'

to_if_held_down.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application id "com.runningwithcrayons.Alfred" to run trigger "search-selection" in workflow "de.chris-grieser.plain-text-utilities"'
osascript -e 'tell application id "com.runningwithcrayons.Alfred" to run trigger "search-selection" in workflow "de.chris-grieser.plain-text-utilities"'
osascript -e 'tell application id "com.runningwithcrayons.Alfred" to run trigger "search-selection" in workflow "de.chris-grieser.plain-text-utilities"'
osascript -e 'tell application id "com.runningwithcrayons.Alfred" to run trigger "search-selection" in workflow "de.chris-grieser.plain-text-utilities"'
osascript -e 'tell application id "com.runningwithcrayons.Alfred" to run trigger "search-selection" in workflow "de.chris-grieser.plain-text-utilities"'
